ai-thi-ap5:1.1_0: “One from the bank of the river,
ai-thi-ap5:1.2_0: I was one who spoke about
ai-thi-ap5:2.2_0: At the time I was born arranged,
ai-thi-ap5:2.3_0: I took a garland of flowers,
ai-thi-ap5:2.4_0: I stood in a mango grove.
ai-thi-ap5:3.4_0: I saw the factors of awakening.
ai-thi-ap5:4.1_0: The thirty-six sections of the Thirty-Three
ai-thi-ap5:5.2_0: rebirth into all states of existence is eradicated,
ai-thi-ap5:5.3_0: With the utter ending of all defilements,
ai-thi-ap5:5.4_0: now there’ll be no more future lives.”
ai-thi-ap5:6.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-thi-ap5:6.2_0: As a bird was worshipped by the flowers,
ai-thi-ap5:6.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-thi-ap5:6.4_0: this carpet is full of fruit.

ai-thi-ap5:10.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior nun Naḷā.
ai-thi-ap5:11.1_0: The fifth Elder Nun Nandā was the fifth section.
